response.original_title: Love Story: John F. Kennedy Jr. & Carolyn Bessette
response.overview: As their love story unfolded on a national stage, the intense fame and media attention that came along with it threatened to rip them apart. The series charts the complex and heartbreaking journey of a couple whose private love became a national obsession.
response.tagline: He was the closest thing to American royalty. She was a star in her own right.
response.title: Love Story: John F. Kennedy Jr. & Carolyn Bessette
